inclusion.criterion: pregnant women with pre- or early pregnancy BMI ≥ 30 kg/m2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: language difficulties requiring an interpreter or translator
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: uncertain gestational age, defined as gestational age determined by other measurements than the Crown-Rump length (CRL) Measurement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: planned elective caesarean section at time of randomisation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 25-year-old G1 P1 pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency and frequency. Physical examination reveals tenderness on palpation of both costovertebral angles.
